"{\"albumId\":\"001\",\"title\":\"海阔天空\",\"summary\":\"BenSound\",\"artist\":{\"name\":\"我喜欢听的音乐\"},\"coverImg\":\"https://upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/27389471-a1707fe9d2881bad.png?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip%7CimageView2/2/w/1240\",\"musics\":[{\"musicId\":\"001\",\"title\":\"真的爱你\",\"artist\":{\"name\":\"我喜欢听的音乐\"},\"coverImg\":\"https://upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/27389471-f14157a593105b44.png?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip%7CimageView2/2/w/1240\",\"url\":\"bensound-sunny.mp3\"},{\"musicId\":\"002\",\"title\":\"喜欢你\",\"artist\":{\"name\":\"我喜欢听的音乐\"},\"coverImg\":\"https://upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/27389471-7d63853a942a9fca.png?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip%7CimageView2/2/w/1240\",\"url\":\"bensound-sunny.mp3\"},{\"musicId\":\"003\",\"title\":\"无尽空虚\",\"artist\":{\"name\":\"我喜欢听的音乐啊\"},\"coverImg\":\"https://upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/27389471-cc98fb028ce6d0d1.png?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip%7CimageView2/2/w/1240\",\"url\":\"bensound-sunny.mp3\"},{\"musicId\":\"004\",\"title\":\"报答一生\",\"artist\":{\"name\":\"我喜欢听的音乐\"},\"coverImg\":\"https://upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/27389471-373738fd8348d00c.png?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip%7CimageView2/2/w/1240\",\"url\":\"bensound-sunny.mp3\"},{\"musicId\":\"005\",\"title\":\"情人\",\"artist\":{\"name\":\"我喜欢听的音乐\"},\"coverImg\":\"https://upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/27389471-9fdaa9fac9c64706.png?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip%7CimageView2/2/w/1240\",\"url\":\"bensound-sunny.mp3\"},{\"musicId\":\"006\",\"title\":\"遥望\",\"artist\":{\"name\":\"我喜欢听的音乐\"},\"coverImg\":\"https://upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/27389471-f9551901c204796c.png?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip%7CimageView2/2/w/1240\",\"url\":\"bensound-sunny.mp3\"},{\"musicId\":\"007\",\"title\":\"光辉岁月\",\"artist\":{\"name\":\"我喜欢听的音乐\"},\"coverImg\":\"https://upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/27389471-34badd275cb94505.png?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip%7CimageView2/2/w/1240\",\"url\":\"bensound-sun "[{\"title\":\"Lifecycle\",\"summary\":\"主要用于在软件工程的背景下，解决生命周期管理的一致性问题\",\"url\":\"https://xiaozhuanlan.com/topic/3684721950\"},{\"title\":\"LiveData\",\"summary\":\"主要用于 配合唯一可信源 完成 生命周期安全的 事件统一分发，以避免收到 不可预期的推送 和 难以追溯的事件源\",\"url\":\"https://xiaozhuanlan.com/topic/0168753249\"},{\"title\":\"ViewModel\",\"summary\":\"主要用于 托管页面状态、分治视图控制器重建时的状态恢复，以及实现 生命周期安全的、事件源可追溯的 跨页面通信\",\"url\":\"https://xiaozhuanlan.com/topic/6257931840\"},{\"title\":\"DataBinding\",\"summary\":\"主要用于在软件工程的背景下，解决视图调用的一致性问题\",\"url\":\"https://xiaozhuanlan.com/topic/9816742350\"},{\"title\":\"Navigation\",\"summary\":\"通过声明式编程来解决 应用内路由导航 的一致性问题\",\"url\":\"https://xiaozhuanlan.com/topic/5860149732\"}]"
本项目中用到的技术点包括：
Product with love by Xiangxue Derry @2021
本页面用于测试 Navigation 路由导航
测试下载，返回页面仍有效
测试下载，离开页面即中止
